title: Sissy - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Adopted Children   Adultery   Arrogant Characters   Blackmail   Bullying   Calm Protagonist   Childhood Love   Cohabitation   Confinement   Cowardly Protagonist   Cruel Characters   Different Social Status   Family Conflict   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   F*llatio   Handsome Male Lead   H*ndjob   Inferiority Complex   Kidnappings   Love Triangles   Male Yandere   Manipulative Characters   Modern Day   Obsessive Love   Persistent Love Interests   Playboys   Poor Protagonist   Possessive Characters   Protagonist Falls in Love First   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   R*pe   Second Chance   Wealthy Characters   Younger Love Interests
author: Shui Qian Cheng   水千丞
description:
The weak and taciturn Li Chengxiu suffered all kinds of bullying during his school days. Shao Qun’s frivolous moment of interest gave him the tiny sliver  of warmth back then. Yet, it also pushed his young self into a much deeper darkness. 

Ten years later, they met again. To Shao Qun, Li Chengxiu was a piece of dessert that he didn’t dare to try in the past, so he approached him with an ulterior motive. 

This time around, will it be an atonement for the past, or the beginning of yet another catastrophe?>
